source.text: An IDE or <<<Integrated>>> <<<Development>>> <<<Environment>>> provides <<<tools>>> to develop software more <<<efficiently>>>.

source.name: Question 2
source.instructions: **Select correct answers from the available list**
source.text: The <<<editor>>> provides facilities such as <<<syntax>>> highlighting and <<<bracket>>> matching. It will also automatically <<<indent>>> the line if it is required.

source.name: Question 3
source.instructions: **Select correct answers from the available list**
source.text: The <<<error>>> diagnostics tool includes facilities such as <<<single-stepping>>> so that single statements can be evaluated and <<<breakpoints>>> which allow the program to be stopped at certain points. The values of variables can be followed throughout a program using the variable <<<tracing>>> facility.
